message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $11,000. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're still looking to save some money, Bob. However, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I can offer you the product for $10,800. It's the best I can do without going below my minimum price.
I understand that you're close to your minimum acceptable price, Alice, but I'm still trying to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're still trying to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I can offer you the product for $10,700. It's the best I can do.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,400 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're still trying to save some money, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $10,600. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
